AUTHOR: Pwnulatr
INSTALL_MSG:
Make sure to get your api key from https://developer.wolframalpha.com/portal/myapps/ 
Set your key with [p]wolframsettings setapikey <key>
NAME: Wolfram
SHORT: Queries the Wolfram Alpha website for text based responses
DESCRIPTION: Query anything you want from the Wolfram Alpha website and the bot will give text based responses.
